column4: hi, I installed warty and just found out that packages doesn't include firewall-gui is there warty's own tool for iptables?
my warty at least listen many ports
how did you test? lots of services like x listen to localhost
111 is portmap, 25 is smtp. you have to have them listening to localhost
where did you do the nmap? locally? you're not listening :)
i have firestarter right here, works fine
